quantspace 0.1.0
  • Reference

Computes standard errors for the quantile regression spacing method using subsampling.

standard_errors.Rd

Computes standard errors for the quantile regression spacing method using subsampling.

resample_qs(
  data,
  dep_col,
  weight_vec,
  sampling_method,
  draw_weights,
  alpha,
  jstar,
  small,
  trunc,
  algorithm,
  subsample_percent,
  var_names,
  ...
)

weighted_bootstrap(
  data,
  dep_col,
  weight_vec,
  sampling_method,
  alpha,
  jstar,
  small,
  trunc,
  algorithm,
  draw_weights,
  var_names,
  subsample_percent,
  ...
)

bootstrap(
  data,
  dep_col,
  weight_vec,
  sampling_method,
  alpha,
  jstar,
  small,
  trunc,
  algorithm,
  draw_weights,
  var_names,
  subsample_percent,
  ...
)

subsample(
  data,
  dep_col,
  sampling_method,
  alpha,
  jstar,
  small,
  trunc,
  algorithm,
  subsample_percent,
  var_names,
  draw_weights,
  weight_vec,
  ...
)

standard_errors(
  dep_col,
  data,
  cluster_matrix,
  algorithm,
  se_method,
  var_names,
  alpha,
  jstar,
  num_bs = 100,
  parallel = F,
  small = 1e-06,
  trunc = FALSE,
  weight_vec = NULL,
  subsample_percent,
  seed = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

data

Regression specification matrix.
dep_col

Column of response variable.
weight_vec

vector of same length and order as dependent column, to be used as weights for estimation (note, if draw weights is set to TRUE, this variable will be the element-wise product of itself and a random vector of weights)
sampling_method

One of "leaveRows", "subsampleRows", or "bootstrapRows". leaveRows doesn't resample rows at all. subsampleRows samples without replacement given some percentage of the data (specified via subsample_percent), and bootstrapRows samples with replacement.
draw_weights

Boolean value; if true, draw a vector of exponential weights to use in subsample
alpha

Quantiles to be estimated.
jstar

First quantile to be estimated (usually the center one)
small

Minimum size of residuals for computational accuracy.
trunc

Boolean value; if true, replace those dependent values less than small with small itself; else, only use rows with residuals greater than small
algorithm

function which is actually used to fit each quantile regression
subsample_percent

percentage of clusters to sample, must be greater than 0 but less than or equal to 1
var_names

RHS regression variable names.
...

other arguments passed to quantile fitting function
cluster_matrix

Matrix of cluster variables, as returned by a model formula
se_method

Method to use for standard errors, either "weighted_bootstrap", "subsample", "bootstrap" or "resample_qs" along with a specified subsampling method (one of "leaveRows", "subsampleRows", or "bootstrapRows") and a subsampling percent.
num_bs

Number of subsample draws (must be greater than 1).
parallel

whether to run in parallel or not
seed

Seed to be used when generating RNG
lambda

optional penalty parameter to be passed to quantile regression
